Humans are known across the galaxy as delicious treats, and have nearly been hunted to extinction. One lonely astronaut roams the Earth’s surface, searching through abandoned bunkers for his lost daughter. One day, he is surprised by a noise behind him. Out of the shadows steps a figure with fangs for teeth and tentacles for hair. But, instead of killing him, she introduces herself…?","fr":"En 2037, tout ce que nous connaissons a changé. Dans toute la galaxie, les humains sont considérés comme de délicieuses friandises et ont presque été chassés jusqu'à l'extinction. In that dungeon, Jinwoo went through real Hell. They cut him, he was crushed, he was tormented, it seemed that he was doomed to a painful death. It was only thanks to a miraculous coincidence that he remained alive. Taking advantage of his second chance, he became the strongest hunter. In this alternate history, Jinwoo finds those who left him to his fate in order to properly punish them and force them to go through the pain that he himself went through. Using a special skill, he reduced the traitors to the size of insects. Having driven them into a trap, he began to carry out his revenge. With his foot, he literally began to turn them into nothing, but he did it as slowly as possible, prolonging the pleasure for himself. Breaking every bone, crushing their body. He made the traitors feel the power of his feet with their whole body. Although their former comrades begged for mercy with pain on their faces and tears in their eyes, their fate was already sealed. For long hours they begged Jinwoo to stop, but his feet continued to destroy their bodies. In the end, they all barely looked human. All that was left of them was minced meat and broken bones. Jinwoo made sure that the traitors felt his power and strength with all their being before death.\n\n---\n**Links:**\n- Alternative Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/GT7_greta7777/status/1794737308929015990)"},"links":{"engtl":"https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/119151161"},"originalLanguage":"en","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"b13b2a48-c720-44a9-9c77-39c9979373fb","name":{"en":"Doujinshi"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

1a41ac76-c3f1-451c-9106-d1589540ade8:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:07:48:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1a41ac76-c3f1-451c-9106-d1589540ade8","title":{"en":"As Leticia Wishes"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Everyone Is Under the Baby’s Feet"},{"ko":"모든 건 아기님 발 아래"},{"ko-ro":"Modeun Geon Aginim Bal Arae"},{"en":"Everything Is Under the Baby's Feet"},{"en":"Everything's Under the Baby's Feet"},{"ja":"すべてはお嬢様の手の中に"},{"zh":"一切都在孩子脚下"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["fr"],"description":{"en":"Stella, the beloved princess of Tyrien, was imprisoned all her life before being used in an eerie sacrifice. After her consciousness fades away, she wakes up to find herself hatching from an egg as a child! Despite her initial bewilderment, Stella quickly adapts to her new life as \"Leticia\" and becomes attached to Beth, a kind professor who may hold the key to finding out who and what she is. But does Leticia have what it takes to uncover the secrets behind both her lives?","fr":"Stella, la princesse bien-aimée de Tyrien, a été emprisonnée toute sa vie avant d'être utilisée pour un étrange sacrifice.
